class elphem.phonon.phonon.Phonon(lattice: Lattice, debye_temperature: float)[source]

Bases: object

Phonon with Debye model.

lattice

A given empty lattice.

Type:

Lattice

debye_temperature

The Debye temperature for phonons.

Type:

float

q

Vectors in a given reciprocal space.

Type:

np.ndarray

n_q

Number of q points.

Type:

int

Type:
